insert into t_client_linkman (client_id, name, duty, mobile, mail, birthday, sex, province, city, county, detail_address, remark, is_default, company_id) values (#{clientId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{duty,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mail,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{birthday,jdbcType=DATE}, #{sex,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{province,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{city,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{county,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{detailAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isDefault,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, #{companyId,jdbcType=BIGINT})
mapper.update: update t_client_linkman set client_id = #{clientId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, duty = #{duty,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, mobile = #{mobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, mail = #{mail,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, birthday = #{birthday,jdbcType=DATE}, sex = #{sex,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, province = #{province,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, city = #{city,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, county = #{county,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, detail_address = #{detailAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, is_default = #{isDefault,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, company_id = #{companyId,jdbcType=BIGINT} where linkman_id = #{linkmanId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select linkman_id, client_id, name, duty, mobile, mail, birthday, sex, province, city, county, detail_address, remark, is_default, company_id from t_client_linkman where linkman_id = #{linkmanId,jdbcType=BIGINT}

select linkman_id, client_id, name, duty, mobile, mail, birthday, sex, province, city, county, detail_address, remark, is_default, company_id from t_client_linkman where client_id = #{clientId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
